# divkings

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of divkings is to give access to user-friendly tools to select the 
companies which increase the size of their dividend. Some are called *dividend 
kings* or *dividend aristocrats* because their dividends have raised continuously 
over the past 50 and 25 years respectively and they belong to the [S&P 500 index](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/s/sp500.asp). 

## Objective
The final objective of this project is to give a new tool to the people 
who are starting to invest in the stock market and want to focus on .

This is a new project, so please stay tuned ! 


## Installation

You can install the development version of divkings from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Layalchristine24/divkings")
```
